pref_backend_supabase.subject: stack.backend
pref_backend_supabase.statement: User prefers Supabase over Firebase for all products including LeadCatcher and ReviewGuard.

repair_shop_filter.subject: business.logic
repair_shop_filter.statement: The Repair Shop Filter is the primary veto: if it doesn't save a technician at the bench time, it is low priority.

profit_target_250k.subject: business.target
profit_target_250k.statement: The absolute objective is $250k/year in net profit, not just revenue.

parts_dell_service_tag.subject: parts.sourcing.dell
parts_dell_service_tag.statement: Dell uses Service Tag for parts lookup. Source: parts-people.com.

parts_screen_panel_number.subject: parts.sourcing.screens
parts_screen_panel_number.statement: Screen lookup uses panel part number from back of LCD (e.g. B156HAN02.1), NOT laptop model number.

parts_avoid_gbole_gintai.subject: parts.sourcing.blacklist
parts_avoid_gbole_gintai.statement: Avoid GBOLE and GinTai on Amazon â€” poor quality parts.

fb_marketplace_whole_devices.subject: parts.sourcing.marketplace
fb_marketplace_whole_devices.statement: FB Marketplace for whole devices (MacBooks, iMacs, laptops) to harvest parts or refurbish. Not for individual parts.

brand_colors.subject: brand.identity
brand_colors.statement: Techy Miramar brand colors: deep navy #0A2A4A and cyan-blue #06B0FD.

gateway_lock_fix.subject: infra.clawdbot
gateway_lock_fix.statement: Clawdbot gateway lock file at /tmp/clawdbot-1001/gateway.820017cb.lock. Kill process + remove lock to fix stuck gateway.
